analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/12/0xc3098b97ba3dd1594b8fc8eae3cd53fb1ecd36af.sol:
	Contract DITCToken has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/12/0xc3098b97ba3dd1594b8fc8eae3cd53fb1ecd36af.sol#242-243)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
